description: You are walking along the Western Road.  Here you see that it is
nothing but fields.  To the west you see a large fence, which the farm
and mansion sits behind.  To the north, you see the Market Podium, and
The Paddock.  The Main Road is to the east.
12011.name: The Western Road

description: You walk into the Gosstal Family Home, the home of Longsaddle's
Mayor.  The house looks like the rest, nothing fancy around it.  A few
paintings hang, which must be the mayor of the village.  The house is
located at the heart of the town.
12041.name: Gosstal Family Home

description: You are walking along the Eastern Road.  The road leads to the
north and south.  To the north stands Ostever's Slaughterhouse, and to
the west is the Rolling Wheel.  Back south is the entrance of the
village.
12031.name: The Eastern Road

description: You walk into a small Armor, Weapons and Accessories shop.
Sixhorn, famous for his riding saddles stands behind the counter,
stiching up a piece of leather.  The shop is filled with many varies
items, from battle armor to riding clothing.  The smell of leather is
strong in here, which makes you notice there fine selection of Leather
Jackets.
12039.name: Sixhorn's Select Wares

description: You walk into the Gilded Horseshoe, the most respected and most
popular Pub within the village.  You see all kinds of noble men, women
and children walking around, enjoying a nice stiff drink, and some
fine steak.  The walls are covered with archives of diffrent relics
and items, and pictures of heros.
12035.name: The Gilded Horseshoe

description: The smells of the bazaar hit you, the sweet smell of food, and the
sounds of a busy market, and busy merchants working away.  To the east
is the Main Road, and to the west is The Market Podium.  To the south
you see the entrance to "Nalathar's Fine Stirrups & Spurs".
12019.name: To The Market Podium

description: You stand at a small intersection in the Main Road.  To the west a
small road leads out of town, towards a Large Mansion.  A few more
buildings stand along the side of the Western Road, including a large
farm at the end, near a small stream.  The Main Road continues north.
12008.name: The Main Road

description: You are walking along the Western Road in Longsaddle.  To the south
a small chapel stands.  A large bell sits outside the chuch on a
stand, waiting to be ring.  The bell is engraved with "Jaster's Ring
Of The Bells".  The road continues to the west, and The Main Road is
to the east.
12009.name: The Western Road

description: You step into the Rolling Wheel, the finest Pub/Inn within the
village of Longsaddle.  Within you see a large pub, a bar stands to
the east, and the floor is covered in tables.  A good amount of locals
and strangers alike sit around this room, drinking away there
adventures, wounds and other pains.  To the far south, stands a large
Inn counter, and a stairwell upstairs.
12045.name: The Rolling Wheel

description: You step into the home of the Ostever's, Longsaddle's local
butcher, and owner of the smelling slaughterhouse to the west.  The
house is filled with all kinds of leathers, and models of cows.  The
home is small, but looks worthy of a man who slaughters cows for a
living.
12043.name: Ostever's Family Home

description: You are walking along the Eastern Road.  Here you stand next to the
"Gosstal Family Home" to the west.  To the north you see two buildings
standing, one being the "Horn & Hoof", and the other "Sixhorn's Select
Wares".  To the south you see several more buildings.
12027.name: The Eastern Road

description: You enter Nalathar's Fine Stirrups & Spurs.  The shop is very
large, filled with the most expensive riding gear, plus other things
that shouldn't be here.  You see that the walls to the right is filled
with diffrent Stirrups, and the wall to the left is filled with Spurs.
The middle of the floor is covered with coat racks, and diffrent
accessories.
12036.name: Nalathar's Fine Stirrups & Spurs

description: You stand on the Eastern Road.  To the east the large "Leaping
Hooves Trade Stable" stands, a place where locals auction off horses,
cattle, and farming stuff.  To the west is the Southern Shortcut,
which will bring you to the Main Road and the main part of the
village.  The Eastern Road stops here.
12030.name: The Eastern Road

description: You stand on the Eastern Road in the village of Longsaddle.  To the
east is a large steak house.  A bright iron sign hangs outside reading
'The Horn & Hoof'.  The smell of steak is strong on this part of the
road.  The Eastern Road goes south, and the Norther Shortcut is to the
west.
12026.name: The Eastern Road

description: You stand on what is the Main Road in Longsaddle.  To the west, you
see a small building with a dirty wooden sign outside, reading "The
Gambling Goldem".  A small bar, which some of the more poor people
come to, but this village holds many bars.  The road continues north,
past the family house and basically into the center of the village.
Back east is the exit out of the village.
12003.name: The Main Road

description: You walk into the small chapel known as Jaster's Ring of the Bells.
The chapel is somewhat small, but would hold the population of
Longsaddle in it.  Row after row of pews line up, to a podium on the
stage in the front.  The chapel has no other rooms in it.  The windows
are stain glass, showing different gods of this world.  As you get
near the podium, you notice a cold draft coming from the floor.
12034.name: Jaster's Ring Of Bells

description: You are walking along the Western Road.  A large fence here goes in
either direction (north or south) across the village.  Through this
fence is the large farm, mansion and stream.  Back east is the
village.
12012.name: The Western Road

description: You enter the Beliver Family Home.  The house is somewhat empty,
and very poor looking, like no one lives here.  The floor boards above
your head creak a little.  The house is dark, with all the shades
drawn.  Most Longsaddle's know that the Beliver's are a home of
crooks, thieves and con-artists.
12038.name: Beliver Family Home

description: You stand at a large intersection of the Main Road.  To the west
you see the entrance to the "Market Podium", a market bazaar which has
many good items.  To the east you see a small road called "The
Northern Shortcut", which leads to the eastern part of the town.  To
the southwest you see "Nalathar's Fine Stirrups & Spurs".  To the east
you see the Gosstal Family Home, or at least the backside of it.
12018.name: The Main Road

description: You step into a small quiet house on the southern end of town.
Inside you see a typical family home of this community.  The house is
decerated to look like something out of a modern western story, most
of the furniture looks rugged.  A family portrait hangs over the
firplace to the east, within the living room.  Other than those items,
the house is pretty much what to expect.
12033.name: The Feldryn Family Home

description: You stand by Saddle Pond, a small pond on the edge of town.  The
pond is filled with a few ducks, and you see some horses next to it,
getting a drink.  A few trees dot the side of the pond, but besides
that its flat grass.  To the west you can see a large fenced in area,
known as "The Paddock".  The path south leads back to Market Podium.
12021.name: By Saddle Pond

description: You stand in the middle of a bustling Market Square.  The whole
podium is filled with all kinds of people, and merchants, you can
hardly move.  The air is thick with smells, and loud with the chatter
of people.  To the south you see "The Gilded Horseshoe", one of the
finest pubs in the village.  To the east you see "Nalathar's Fine
Stirrups & Spurs" a place for horse riders to go buy there 'stuff'.
To the north is Saddle Pond.
12020.name: The Market Podium

description: You are walking along the Eastern Road.  To the east you see a
small house that belongs to "The Ostever's Family".  To the west you
see the very large "Ostever's Slaughterhouse" which seems to dwarf
there house.  The smell of raw meat, and the sounds of chopping and
death cries echo from the slaughterhouse.
12029.name: The Eastern Road

description: You are walking on The Main Road, leading out of Longsaddle.  To
the south most of the village lies before you, to the north a few
buildings stand, and the road out to the northern areas.  You can see
"The Night Cloak" and "The Beliver Family Home".  The Main Road
continues north and south.
12022.name: The Main Road

description: The fork in the road.  Each road will bring you to one side of
Longsaddle.  To the east, the road goes off around "The Rolling Wheel"
Inn, and near "The Leaping Hooves Trade Stable".  To the west, the rad
leads near the "Gambling Golem" and one of the village's family
houses.  Either way leads into Longsaddle.  To the south, is the
entrance to the village and the road to Waterdeep.
12001.name: The Main Road

description: You are walking along the Northern Shortcut, a path between the
Main Road and The Eastern Road.  From here you can see "The Horn &
Hoof", a fancy steak house in the village.  You also see the Eastern
Road, which turns and goes south through the eastern parts of the
village.
12025.name: Northern Shortcut

description: You walk into "The Night Cloak", a thieves bar on the northern end
of town, and you see almost nothing.  The air is thick with smoke, but
you can hear voices within the smoke.  A dagger wizzes by your head,
connecting with the door frame.  You feel very unwelcomed.  A few more
voices snicker at you.  Either take a chance and have a drink, or get
out.
12037.name: The Night Cloak

description: You are walking along the Eastern Road.  This road leads to the
eastern side of the small village of Longsaddle.  The road here either
goes west to the entrance of the village, or north.
12002.name: The Eastern Road

description: You are walking along the Eastern Road in Longsaddle.  To the east
you see a large ranch home, with a sign outside reading "Irmarl's
Family Home".  The road continues south and north from here.  To the
south you can see Ostever's Family Home, and the slaughterhouse.
12028.name: The Eastern Road

description: Welcome to the Horn & Hoof, the best place to get a steak and eat
some good old country food.  The steak house is nothing but one large
room.  Most of the floor is covered in large square tables, most of
them filled with customers.  To the north, a large bar stands, also
filled with people boozing up for the day.  In the center of all of
this, is the large kitchen, totally in the open, so the smell of food
goes out to all.
12040.name: The Horn & Hoof

description: You are walking along the Western Road, where a small bridge
expands over a semi-large stream.  A sign on the bridge points out the
name of the stream, which is "The Hill Stream".  A large white mansion
stands away from here, in a cluster of trees.  Back east is the Main
Village.
12014.name: Bridge

description: The Western Road turns here, either going north or east.  To the
east you see the main village, and to the west you see a large farm,
and mansion.
12010.name: The Western Road

description: You walk into the Leaping hooves Trade Stable.  Before you stands a
large open barn, with many stalls through-out it, filled with horses.
That barn smell is strong in the air, and a large man is hovering over
you.
12046.name: The Leaping Hooves Trade Stable

description: You stand in a small bend in The Main Road.  The road turns and
begins to go north, into a small intersection.  You see the other
buildings of the village sticking out.  A fence line runs along the
western side of the village, leading to a large mansion.  The Main
Road continues north and south.
12007.name: The Main Road

description: You stand on the Southern Shortcut, the cross place to go between
the Main Road, and the Eastern Road.  To the north stands a large
building, with bright red letters on the front reading "Ostever's
Slaughterhouse".  From within the smell of raw meat soaks out into the
open air, and the sounds of cattle being slaughter is heard from time
to time.  To the south stands "The Rolling Wheel", the main Inn within
the village of Longsaddle.
12006.name: Southern Shortcut

description: You are walking along the Main Road, which is leading into the main
part of town.  To the south a good cluster of buildings stands, mostly
shops of diffrent kinds.  To the northwest you see "The Gilded
Horseshoe", one of the most respected bars in town.  Also the Market
Podium, a good place for purchasing items stands, plus more of the
village.
12016.name: The Main Road

description: You are walking along the Northern Shortcut, a path between the
Main Road in town, and the Eastern Road.  To the north you see
Sixhorn's Select Wares, a shop filled with armor, weapons, and horse
riding wears.  The shortcut continues east into the Eastern Road.
12024.name: Northern Shortcut

description: You are walking along the Western Road.  To the east you can make
out the small village of Longsaddle, a Farming and Horse Riding
community.  Also to the east you see a large farm, and a fence running
the length of the village.  The village is to the east.
12015.name: The Western Road

description: You are walking along the Western Road.  To the north, a large dirt
path leads into a farm area.  You see a large farm house, which has a
porch on the front.  To the south of the farm house stands a large
barn, with 5 fenced in stables on the sides, for varies animals.  A
sign next to the dirt path reads "Harpell Hill Farm".  The Western
Road continues west, over a large bridge and off to the mansion.  The
main village is back to the east.
12013.name: The Western Road

description: You walk into a small home, the home of the Irmarl's.  The house is
a typical one, a small living room area, dining room, kitchen, and
bedrooms upstairs.  There is nothing more here.
12042.name: Irmarl Family Home

description: A blacksmith's shed has been set up here on the outskirts of
Longsaddle.  There are all manner of things of the smithy trade
scattered in this shed.  To the left is the furnace, which is stacked
from firebrick and has no less than six pits of varying degrees of
heat.  A giant bellows sits at the back left, and next to it is the
wall which hangs many items that this blacksmith made.  In the center
of the room are two anvils, one small, one large, and a set of
hammers, prongs, tongs and shaping bars sits in a cage next to the
smaller of the two.
12048.name: The Smithy

description: The space beneath the chapel is dank and dark.  The light from the
above chapel shines down through the cracks in the floorboards.  A
cold draft blows through, and to the north there is a faint flicker of
light.
You are walking along the Main Road in Longsaddle.  To the west you
see a large family home, with a wooden sign on the door reading "The
Feldryn Family Home".  You see a few villagers walking the Main Road,
riding on horses.  Most of them look like they ride horses and other
beasts for a living.
12004.name: The Main Road

description: You are walking down the Main Road of Longsaddle.  To the northwest
is the Market Podium, and a few more of the shops.  You see a large
intersection to the north, which leads to the Market Podium or the
Eastern side of town.  The Main Road stretches north and south.
12017.name: The Main Road

description: You stand right before a fork in the road, and before the small
village of Longsaddle.  To the north, you see about 20 buildings that
make up the town.  You see some horses and riders in the fields around
the village.  The air is fresh, and crisp.  To the north is Longsaddle
and to the south is the leading to Waterdeep.
12000.name: Entrance to {BLongsaddle{x

description: You walk into the Slaughterhouse, which brings the horrid stench of
dead creatures and raw meat.  This part of the building is clean, you
see some meats packaged on shelves on either side of you.  A large
counter stands to the north, with a large cubby guy behind it.  The
guy stands at a cutting block, chopping up the latest kill.  A door
behind him reads "Slaughterhouse", meaning that is the room where the
animals are chopped, diced and processed into meat.
12044.name: Ostever's Slaugherhouse

description: You walk into a small dark bar, called "The Gambling Golem".  The
bar is very dim, but you can see a few souls wandering around.  To the
northern wall stands a large bar, filled with a few of the locals.
Round tables scatter the area, most of them have some type of card
game going on.  The air is strong with the stench of alcohol and
smoke.
12032.name: The Gambling Golem

description: You stand at the northern edge of the small village of Longsaddle.
Two buildings stands on either side of you, the northern plains are
north, and the village to the south.  The village from this distance
looks like a horse and caddle town.  The smell of dung and horses is
strong here.  "The Night Cloak" is to the west, a small thief bar on
the end of town.  To the east is the "Beliver Family Home", which are
known for being thieves.  The Main Road continues south, and the road
out of the village goes north.
12023.name: The Main Road

description: You come to a small intersection on The Main Road.  To the east is
the small road called "The Sourthen Shortcut" which leads just south
of "Ostever's Slaugherhouse" and to the "Leaping Hooves Trade Stable".
Also the eastern road lies on that side of town.  The Main Road
continues to the west.
12005.name: The Main Road

12046.room_name: The owner of the Stables stands here, tring to make a deal.
12046.name: the stable owner~

12047.room_name: A large riding horse stands here.
12047.name: a horse~

description: Before you stands an average sized human. He is quite skilled with the fine liquids he holds in his hands, and you can tell at first glance that he's been doing it for a while.
12000.room_name: Jimmie the bartender stands here behind the bar.
12000.name: Jimmie the Bartender~

description: A tall man stands here already drunk and drinking more.
12001.room_name: The local drunk is here drinking away.
12001.name: the local drunk~

description:
Before you stands an average male human.
Everything bout this man strikes you as being remarkably average.
12002.room_name: The man of the house, Mr. Feldryn stands here watching the kids.
12002.name: Mr. Feldryn~

description: Jose is a small boy, and looks very much like his father.
12003.room_name: Jose Feldryn sits here playing with his sister.
12003.name: Jose Feldryn~
subroutines: M speech 12002 hey! you kids keep it down!~

description: A small little girl is here playing with her brother.
12004.room_name: Sarah Feldryn sits here playing with Jose.
12004.name: Sarah Feldryn~
subroutines: M speech 12002 hey! you kids keep it down!~

description: A tall slender lady stands behind the bar serving the guests.
12005.room_name: Behind the bar Jennifer the barmaid stands talking to customers.
12005.name: Jennifer the Barmaid~

12006.room_name: A drunk man sits here talking to the bar maid.
12006.name: a drunk~

12007.room_name: The town butcher stands here selling some steaks.
12007.name: Mr Ostever the Butcher~

12008.room_name: The lady of the house stands here cleaning house.
12008.name: Mrs. Ostever~

12009.room_name: Mrs. Irmarl is here watching the house.
12009.name: Mrs. Irmarl~

12010.room_name: The Mayor of the town stands here watching the townspeople pass his door outside.
12010.name: Mayor Gosstal~

12011.room_name: The muscular bartender is here impressing the ladies with his muscles.
12011.name: Javier the Bartender~

description:
She's drunk, no doubt about that.  Her corset is hanging loose from
her chest, revealing...  Well, let's just say the bartender hasn't
turned his eyes from her all this time!
12012.room_name: A very slender lady is here flirting with the bartender.
12012.name: a drunk lady~

12013.room_name: A lady stands here by the bar staring at Javier's muscles.
12013.name: a drunk lady~

12014.room_name: A lady stands here by the bar staring at Javier's muscles.
12014.name: a drunk lady~

12015.room_name: A shopkeeper stands here selling his goods to travelers.
12015.name: the shopkeeper~

12016.room_name: A man is here standing in the corner with his eyes locked on your purse.
12016.name: a crook~

12017.room_name: One of the many thieves that terrorize the area is sitting here at the bar telling stories of the day.
12017.name: a local thief~

12018.room_name: A small thief sits at the bar here looking admiringly at the other thief.
12018.name: a thief~

12019.room_name: The bartender Iscariot stands here listening to the thieves tales.
12019.name: Iscariot the Thief~

12020.room_name: A small man stands here selling his stirrups and spurs.
12020.name: a short man~

12021.room_name: The bartender is here mixing drinks for all of the high paying customers.
12021.name: a bartender~

12022.room_name: A well dressed man is sitting at the bar telling all the ladies about his modeling buisness.
12022.name: Thomas the merchant~

12023.room_name: A very pretty lady is here talking to Thomas about modeling for him.
12023.name: a pretty lady~

12024.room_name: A very pretty lady is here talking to Thomas about modeling for him.
12024.name: a pretty lady~

12025.room_name: A citizen of Longsaddle is here walking around.
12025.name: a Longsaddle citizen~

12026.room_name: A citizen of Longsaddle is here walking around.
12026.name: a Longsaddle citizen~

12027.room_name: A citizen of Longsaddle is here walking around.
12027.name: a Longsaddle citizen~

12028.room_name: A citizen of Longsaddle is here walking around.
12028.name: a Longsaddle citizen~

12029.room_name: Jaster is standing here on the podium prepating for his next service.
12029.name: Jaster~

12030.d_flags: D {cfalls over his anvil with his remaining strength,{x~
description:
He is a rather short man for a smith.  Large framed and stocky, his
muscles bulge from his tight fitting apron, making him look
uncomfortable.  He wields a small hammer, suggesting that his work is
more in intricacy than in volume.  He stops to greet strangers with a
smile, as is the friendly atmosphere in these parts.
12030.room_name: {gJoule {xthe {wS{8mith{x stands here fanning himself in the heat.
12030.name: {gJoule {xthe {wS{8mith{x~
subroutines:
M speech 12053 platinum orb~
M grall 12053 75~
M bribe 12038 10000~
M give 12051 8196~
M give 12049 8195~
M speech 12039 staff of revelation~
M give 12033 24372~
M give 12033 24371~
M give 12033 24370~
M speech 12031 socket~
M speech 12031 channeling rod~
M speech 12031 channelling rod~
M give 12034 3374~
M give 12034 8131~
M give 12034 51622~
M give 12043 39291~
M give 12044 12024~
M speech 12032 look at an item~
M speech 12045 pendant of power~
M speech 12047 polished star rub~
M speech 12048 traveler~
M speech 12048 clausius~
M speech 12046 starlet ruby helm~

description:
This gnome looks like he hasn't slept in days, as evident by his
shaking arms and the rather large pile of empty mugs that sits in a
pile nearby.  He sits at his workbench, fiddling with some strange
contraption, picking it up, putting it back down, picking something
else back up, messing with both at the same time, making you dizzy in
the whole process.  He wears a crazily complicated pair of eyewear,
and a beanie upon which is fastened all manner of metal extensions and
gadgets at the ends.  He is thin and gangly, his hair is long and
frazzled and unkept, greying in spots and suggesting that he is
getting up there in years, or his work is taking its toll.  He only
looks up briefly to acknowlege anyone is there, before returning to
his work.
12031.name: {wG{Wu{ce{Mri{cc{Wk{we{x~
subroutines:
M speech 12017 reform the gem~
M give 12015 lifestream~
M give 12015 51816~
M give 12015 51817~
M give 12015 8128~
M speech 12014 component item~
M give 12013 33451~
